alert.note: Alert for Coconino; Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 22 at 6:25AM MST until March 22 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM MST/130 PM MDT/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt is occurring. * WHERE...Areas near Ash Fork. * WHEN...Until 1230 PM MST Wednesday /130 PM MDT Wednesday/. * IMPACTS...Flooding of creeks and normally dry washes is occurring. Further rises in the water levels of already flooded creeks and normally dry washes. Deadly flooding over low-water crossings. Roads are closed and impassable due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 625 AM MST /725 AM MDT/, the public reported water flowing over roadways in the Ash Fork area due to earlier heavy rain and snow melt. Flooding is already occurring. - This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Johnson Creek, Partridge Creek, Ash Fork Draw and Meath Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ash Fork. - This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 145 and 147. Business Interstate 40 near mile marker 146. State Route 89 between mile markers 358 and 363. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
